title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 495.1 - Official insignia
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 495.1 - Official insignia

State Regulations

The official insignia of State, county and city civil
defense agencies is hereby declared to be as follows: the letters CD in red (or
black, in black-and-white printing) centered within a white triangle, surrounded by a blue (or black, in black-and-white printing) circle; around the
bottom of the said circle, the words New York in white letters; around the top
of the circle, the name, in white letters of the particular civil defense
office, or established civil defense section or service duly authorized to
employ or display the said insignia in connection with its official duties. No
other insignia except that herein prescribed shall be employed by State, county
and city civil defense agencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
495.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
